Articles.Content:
this is a space shuttle i made and is meant to be an improved version of my Space shuttle ESmall, this space shuttle is easier to control and more powerful with a higher orbital range.

Space shuttle ESmall Download:

[http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13320.msg204278#msg204278](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=13320.msg204278#msg204278)

make sure 2 turn on SAS and RCS because it needs to me kept stable at launch for about 30 secs 

you will need these mods:

Nova punch remix

kw challenger

c7 (all of them)

down under

if u like be sure 2 check my other craft Search Me LOLMAMA

please give feedback
